mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ai_client_system_prompt(prompt_id, prompt_name, prompt_content, description, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES(#{promptId}, #{promptName}, #{promptContent}, #{description}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE ai_client_system_prompt SET prompt_name = #{promptName}, prompt_content = #{promptContent}, description = #{description}, status = #{status}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, prompt_id, prompt_name, prompt_content, description, status, create_time, update_time FROM ai_client_system_prompt WHERE status = 1 ORDER BY create_time DESC
